cell.seg: Interview with Thomas Latter of Hertfordshire, esquire
Revolution Society. Price in the chair. Motion by Tooke against nobility: pro. Cooper, Sharpe, Favel: con. Rees, Watson, Towers, Perry, Price—Garrow
Talk at P. n's of Mirabeau & immortality. Notoriety
with J C on honesty & talents
Stuart & Jardine, talk of truth & self love
I address Dyson on violence & misanthropy
Talk with Holcroft of literary monopoly
Visit Dr Priestley, talk of the importance of politics, & moral causation
Soir, Paradise's, Jardine, Planta, Lord Sandys, Adriani
Paradise’s, Hawke, Ingenhousz, Planta, Gillies, Dornford: abused by madame
Paradise’s, E. Pomfret, lady Say & Sele, Smirnhoff, Gillies, Russel, Bancroft
Evening, J Hollis’s, talk of atheism
Philomaths, connexion of free states & despots
talk w. H R. of Cant, &c
Calonn'es, w. Dyson, Reveleys, mrs Jennings & mrs West
Bryan's, with Holcroft//; adv. W Smith
Norman's, talk of God, industry, drinking & swearing
Newgate; Holcroft, Tooke, Thelwal, Kyd, Richter, Joyce, Bosville, Frost & col. Miles
Play, Roman Father, & Wedding Day; adv. Brunton & K Courtenay
Gerald's Come; Mackintosh, Maxwel, Fergusson, Perry & Ht
Play, the Three & the Deuce, & the Agreeable Surprise, w. T. C.
Play, Isabella & the Prize, w. C
walk w. Ht & Perry; adv. Sheridan & Richardson
Day Wt; call on Inchbald; go to the Orleans Gallery, adv. Nicholson
Introd, Dr Burke, capt. Atkinson & Bushe
Bray Diligence, w. mrs & miss Reeves
Asks of R C; talks of Strafford & Leland
Sit to Northcote; adv. W Hazlit
meet, w. him, O’Hara & mrs Cooke
Poole’s, music, Youngs surgeon, C Young, Dickons, Boltons, Horns, Gumfords, Webbs, Miller, Phipps, Pocock, miss Biggs, F & J
M J calls of S E
visit Mackintosh, w. Mde Stael, Horner, Jos. Wedgwood jr & miss Allens
Hurst’s, Tooke’s Court, w. Shelley, Newton, Hookham, Sorrel & Amory
C C at home; adv. Booth
Talk w. Lovewell. on M J
consultation; Brougham, B M , Wetherel, Horne, Longdil, L H & P B S
Vestry; adv. Waithman & sir R Phillips
Serjeants’ Inn, w. them, & H P
Basinghall Street; Macmillan, Greenhill, Duncan, Hume, R Taylor, Evans, 3 Reads, Macgowan, Lammin, Prince & mrs Ravenscroft
